synopsis.text: As New Year's Eve approaches in Petersburg, Eila of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing aims to take her squadmate Sanya on a leisurely walk around the festively decorated city. However, Eila's attempts to ask Sanya out keep getting interrupted, separating the two friends. Meanwhile, preparations are underway for a holiday celebration in Petersburg, but the festivities are threatened by an approaching Neuroi that could attack the base and disrupt the events. Eila remains determined to spend time with Sanya amidst the hectic atmosphere, but must balance her personal plans with her duties to defend against the looming Neuroi threat. Whether the squadmates get their time together or not, this New Year's promises excitement and danger for the 501st.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
